quote: Electrical Engineers do it with more resistance.
author: John Shedd

quote: A theory may be so rich in description that it can hardly be wrong, but it may be useless.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: An expert is a man who has made all the mistakes which can be made in a narrow field.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: Design is not what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A good scientist is a person with original ideas. A good engineer is a person who makes a design that works with as few ideas as possible.
author: Freeman Dyson

quote: A horse is a sphere if it makes the equation easier.
author: Internet

quote: It is necessary to learn from other people's mistakes. You will not live long enough to make them all yourself.
author: Hyman Rickover

quote: The client is not always right.
author: Enzo Ferrari

quote: Doctors can kill one patient at a time. Engineers can be more efficient.
author: Internet

quote: A bad design with good presentation is doomed eventually. A good design with bad presentation is doomed immediately.
author: Internet

quote: The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore, all progress depends on the unreasonable man
author: George Bernard Shaw, Man and Superman
